about_the_game:
Play the action-adventure platformer set within a physics sandbox, where you can build worlds for your ragdoll to explore, solve puzzles, or simply enjoy the fun of ragdoll physics. It features simple yet satisfying combat and parkour mechanics, along with an engaging story mode that blends action, humor, and emotional depth into a captivating experience.

Story Mode
Ragdolls are forced to compete in mini-games, unaware of the dark truth behind their supposed freedom earned from victory. Dummy Danny and Rickie Ragdoll are determined to win, but their friendship is tested by betrayal. When Danny discovers truth of the world around him and his kind, the quest for redemption, truth, and freedom begins.

Features
  • Embark on a thrilling adventure in story mode with Dummy Danny and Rickie Ragdoll.
  • Play as a ragdoll and traverse the world by jumping, rolling, fighting, and climbing your way to victory.
  • Build worlds in sandbox mode using different shaped blocks, doors, switches, vehicles, and more.
  • Customize the look of your ragdoll and play split screen with your friends! (Sandbox only)

Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11 Big Sur or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 chip or later
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 integrated GPU or later
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
